name: STUG
description:
Battle other players in tanks inspired by iconic fighting vehicles including heavy tanks, half-tracks, and armored cars. Use special abilities like grenades and airstrikes to gain the upper hand and dominate your opponents.

Personalize your tank! Flex your skills by unlocking camouflage patterns, and go to the Shop to customize your vehicle with unique stickers and decals.

STUG is always evolving with rotating gamemodes, new maps, and new vehicles. Play now!
